/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a canopy of greenery over the urban landscape. The buildings, predominantly white and gray, rise high into the sky, their facades adorned with windows that reflect the world around them. The street itself is a hive of activity, with cars and bicycles moving along its length, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static cityscape.
